titleStmt.title: God's zeal thundered forth, against all those magistrates, bishops, priests and people of this city of London, who have deserted their brethren in this day of sore calamity.
titleStmt.author: R. C. (Richard Crane)

publicationStmt.date: Printed the 4th. day of the 6th. moneth, 1665.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
